description: Konoka is about as sweet and kind as girl can be. A supportive and teasing best friend and room-mate to Asuna, Konoka is one of the first pupils to warm up to Negi by offering him the chance to move-in with her and Bells. The granddaughter of Mahora`s Dean Konoe, Konoka carries within her a big secret and must be protected by a hidden guardian in class. Lately, her childhood pal Setsuna has been giving her the cold shoulder. What`s behind the friction?
name: Konoe Konoka
